blocks.heading: It All Starts With Our Feed
blocks.textRight: For more than six decades, we’ve been producing high quality eggs and that’s how we know that the difference is in the feed. As they say, “you are what you eat,” and the same rules apply to our chickens.
blocks.stat:
Chino Valley Ranchers owns and operates  
 _Southern California’s only certified organic feed mill for poultry_  
 to ensure the highest quality and purity.
blocks.subheading: Our commitment to organic goes well beyond standard. We strive to provide you with the highest quality eggs. That’s why we control every step of the process. It all starts with our feed.

blocks.headingLeft: Using nutritious organic feed has many benefits, including:

list.title: Better For Our Chickens
list.description: We develop our feed specifically to help keep our chickens stay healthy, active and content.

list.title: Better For Our Eggs
list.description: Organic feed has a positive impact on the quality and nutritional value of our eggs.

list.title: Better For You
list.description: Our chickens don’t consume hormones, antibiotics, or animal by-products, which means you don’t either!
